title: Guided Evening Wildlife Walk
description: A guided evening walk through the wildlife centre focusing on nocturnal British animals. Visitors will learn about animal behaviour, habitats, and conservation challenges faced by native species.

title: British Mammals Conservation Talk
description: An informative talk led by conservation experts discussing the protection of British mammals, current threats, and how the public can support conservation initiatives.

title: Family Nature Discovery Day
description: A family-friendly event with guided tours, interactive exhibits, and hands-on activities designed to help families learn about British wildlife together.

title: Seasonal Wildlife Trail Challenge
description: Families can take part in a fun wildlife trail challenge around the centre, spotting animals and completing educational activities along the way.

title: Junior Wildlife Rangers Club
description: An interactive session designed for children to learn about British wildlife through games, storytelling, and simple conservation activities.

title: Build a Wildlife Home Workshop
description: Children will learn how to help local wildlife by building simple homes for birds and insects, encouraging conservation awareness from a young age.
